Fault.name: BPEL/TravelApproval.bpel
Fault.fix: Fix the process to be *either* durable or synchronous.
Fault.msg: Process "TravelApproval" is both durable (onMessage,Receive,Wait) and synchronous.

Fault.name: BPEL/TravelApproval.bpel
Fault.fix: A <receive> or <pick> with createInstance set to "true" must be present.
Fault.msg: There is no start activity in process "TravelApproval"
